questions.question: A widely used technique for predicting continuous values.
A linear regression model that includes polynomial terms.
A measure of how well the regression line fits the data points.
A regression model with multiple predictor variables.
A technique used to handle missing data in regression analysis.
A regression model with only one predictor variable.
A probabilistic regression model used for binary classification tasks.
A measure of how well the logistic regression model fits the data.
